ApprovalWorkItemCondition.name: ApprovalWorkItemCondition
ApprovalWorkItemCondition.description: Represents a condition for starting and concluding an approval step that's evaluated as part of the smart approval process.

ApprovalWorkItemCriteriaId.description: The approval work item criteria associated with the approval work item condition. The approval work item criteria defines the logic by which the approval conditions are evaluated.

ConditionSequencePosition.description: The order in which the condition is evaluated relative to other conditions that are part of the requirement logic.

HasEvaluationSucceeded.description: Indicates whether the first value (left side) evaluates against the second value (right side) successfully (true) or not (false).

LeftValue.description: The first value of the condition that's evaluated against the second value.

LeftValueDataType.description: The data type of the first operand (left side) in this condition.

Name.description: The sequentially-generated name of the approval work item condition record, for example AWCO-000000071.

RightValue.description: The second value (right side) of the condition that's evaluated against the first value.

RightValueDataType.description: The data type of the second operand for the condition.
